titles.title: BIG Data for IP Act

To amend the Leahy-Smith America Invents Act to extend the period during which the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the United States Patent and Trademark Office may set or adjust certain fees, and for other purposes.
BIG Data for IP Act
Building Innovation Growth through Data for Intellectual Property Act

bill.summary:
Building Innovation Growth through Data for Intellectual Property Act or the BIG Data for IP Act
This bill amends the Leahy-Smith America Invents Act to extend for eight years the authority of the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to set and adjust patent fees.
